name: Benjamin Fish
content: Benjamin Fish Benjamin Fish Home Papers email Most recently I was an Assistant Professor in Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Michigan. My research is in developing methods for understanding and incorporating human values into AI by making the social world visible to AI. I was also previously at Mila and Microsoft Research, and completed my PhD at the University of Illinois at Chicago.
